name: Super Street Fighter 4
description:
Super Street Fighter 4 is an arcade-fighting game developed by Capcom. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Capcom. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Super Street Fighter 4 on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
Yoshinori Ono produced the game. Taisaku Okada directed the game. Hideyuki Fukasawa scored the game.
